job_purpose: Joining the tech team at Alinta Energy to build smart systems for cleaner energy and contribute to Australia's energy transition.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Complete discipline-aligned rotations across the business
Gain hands-on experience and exposure to real projects
Contribute to the transition to sustainable energy
Work on building smart systems for cleaner energy
Access LinkedIn Learning for continuous growth
Travel to offices and generation sites
required_qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Data Science, or Software Engineering
Ability to start a full-time role in Perth
Australian/New Zealand Citizenship or Australian Permanent Residency status
company_details: Alinta Energy is committed to delivering affordable, reliable, and sustainable energy for Australia. They offer a supportive work environment with opportunities for growth and impact. As an equal opportunity employer, Alinta Energy values diversity and encourages applications from all qualified individuals.
